prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, Drums, Bass, but without Pipe.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Bass, Guitar, Piano, and Synth Pad, but no Pipe.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Piano, Bass, Drums, Guitar, and Synth Pad, omitting Pipe.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Synth Pad, Guitar, Piano, Drums, and Bass, Pipe excluded.
